headline: Should Visa’s (V) Sustainability Data Partnership with Ample Earth Matter to Investors?
summary: Visa recently announced a partnership with Ample Earth to bring merchant-specific sustainability data into the payment ecosystem, aiming to embed this data in digital banking apps and loyalty programs worldwide. This collaboration highlights the growing role of sustainability intelligence in financial services, reflecting Visa's commitment to shaping customer engagement and supporting responsible commerce. We'll examine how Visa's integration of actionable sustainability data through Ample...
